page.title: 12T.V.channels,N.Wingfield
page.content: Our survey of the 168 families(page11) revealed that 166 of them owned a television(T.V.).It seems that T.V. plays a very important part in the home life of families in this area.As such a large number of families owned a T.V.,we decided to find out more specifically which T.V.channels they watch and what types of programme they prefer.We considered both adult preferences and children's.Pages 13&14 illustrate our findings. {T.V.channel } {No. %} I.T.V.(commercial-advertising)116 69.9 Channel 4( " ) 4 2.4 B.B.C.1(funded by licence fee) 42 25.3 B.B.C.2( " ) 4 2.4
